jtbds.statement: When using the website or app, I want to increase the font size, so I can read text comfortably with my visual impairment.
jtbds.situation: using the website or app
jtbds.motivation: increase the font size
jtbds.outcome: read text comfortably with my visual impairment
sourceQuotes: As a user with visual impairment, I want the ability to increase the font size on the website and app, so that I can read product descriptions and other text comfortably.

jtbds.statement: When managing multiple office locations or client sites, I want to save multiple shipping addresses under my account, so I can easily ship orders directly to different destinations.
jtbds.situation: managing multiple office locations or client sites
jtbds.motivation: save multiple shipping addresses under my account
jtbds.outcome: easily ship orders directly to different destinations
sourceQuotes: I want the ability to save multiple shipping addresses under my account, so that I can easily ship orders directly to different office locations or client sites.

jtbds.statement: When I order something big like a fridge, I want detailed, real-time tracking updates, including the delivery window, so I can plan to be home and know exactly when it will arrive.
jtbds.situation: I order something big like a fridge
jtbds.motivation: I want detailed, real-time tracking updates, including the delivery window
jtbds.outcome: I can plan to be home and know exactly when it will arrive
sourceQuotes: When I order something big like a fridge, I want detailed, real-time tracking updates, including the delivery window, so I can plan to be home and know exactly when it will arrive.

jtbds.statement: When my payment information changes, I want to easily locate and update my saved credit card details, so I can complete purchases without hassle.
jtbds.situation: my payment information changes
jtbds.motivation: easily locate and update my saved credit card details
jtbds.outcome: complete purchases without hassle
sourceQuotes: I can't find where to update my saved credit card.
Found it, thanks. It wasn't obvious.

jtbds.statement: When I need to refill a prescription, I want a clear and prominent link or section on the website for pharmacy services, so I can manage my refills quickly and efficiently online
jtbds.situation: I need to refill a prescription
jtbds.motivation: I want a clear and prominent link or section on the website for pharmacy services
jtbds.outcome: I can manage my refills quickly and efficiently online
sourceQuotes: When I need to refill a prescription, I want a clear and prominent link or section on the website for pharmacy services, so I can manage my refills quickly and efficiently online.

jtbds.statement: When I'm trying to buy multiple bulky items online, I want to see the estimated shipping cost before I get to the final checkout page, so I can decide if the order is worth placing or if I should just go to the store.
jtbds.situation: I'm trying to buy multiple bulky items online
jtbds.motivation: see the estimated shipping cost before I get to the final checkout page
jtbds.outcome: decide if the order is worth placing or if I should just go to the store
sourceQuotes: When I'm trying to buy multiple bulky items like paper towels and water bottles online, I want to see the estimated shipping cost *before* I get to the final checkout page, so I can decide if the order is worth placing or if I should just go to the store.

jtbds.statement: When I need to restock essential products, I want to reorder items quickly, so I can save time and avoid the hassle of searching.
jtbds.situation: I need to restock essential products
jtbds.motivation: reorder items quickly
jtbds.outcome: save time and avoid the hassle of searching
sourceQuotes: I want a simple 'reorder' button on my past orders page, so that I can quickly repurchase essentials without searching for them again.

jtbds.statement: When I am comparing electronics, I want to find warranty information directly on the product page, so I can factor it into my purchase decision.
jtbds.situation: I am comparing electronics
jtbds.motivation: find warranty information directly on the product page
jtbds.outcome: factor it into my purchase decision
sourceQuotes: It would be helpful if product pages for electronics included links to the manufacturer's warranty information directly.
As someone comparing TVs, I want to easily find warranty details without leaving the Costco site, so that I can factor that into my purchase decision.

jtbds.statement: When I need to return an item bought online, I want clear, step-by-step instructions directly on the return initiation page, so I know exactly what to do and avoid delays.
jtbds.situation: I need to return an item bought online
jtbds.motivation: I want clear, step-by-step instructions directly on the return initiation page
jtbds.outcome: I know exactly what to do and avoid delays
sourceQuotes: Initiating a return online was confusing.
The instructions weren't clear about whether I needed to print a label or wait for one.

jtbds.statement: When choosing between similar Kirkland Signature products, I want to read reviews from other members, so I can make a more confident purchase decision based on their experiences
jtbds.situation: choosing between similar Kirkland Signature products
jtbds.motivation: read reviews from other members
jtbds.outcome: make a more confident purchase decision based on their experiences
sourceQuotes: It's hard to choose between similar Kirkland Signature products without reviews.
As a shopper trying to decide on a new product, I want to read reviews from other members, so that I can make a more confident purchase decision based on their experiences.

jtbds.statement: When browsing Costco Travel deals, I want to see my potential savings based on my Executive membership level, so I can better understand the value proposition
jtbds.situation: browsing Costco Travel deals
jtbds.motivation: see my potential savings based on my Executive membership level
jtbds.outcome: better understand the value proposition
sourceQuotes: When browsing Costco Travel deals, I want to see my potential savings based on my Executive membership level clearly displayed, so I can better understand the value proposition

jtbds.statement: When I am ordering online for warehouse pickup, I want to access my membership card digitally, so I can avoid carrying the physical card.
jtbds.situation: I am ordering online for warehouse pickup
jtbds.motivation: I want to access my membership card digitally
jtbds.outcome: I can avoid carrying the physical card
sourceQuotes: Could we please have a digital version of the membership card accessible in the app?
so that I don't have to carry the physical card, especially when ordering online for warehouse pickup.

jtbds.statement: When an item I want is out of stock online, I want to be notified by email when it becomes available again, so I can avoid checking back manually.
jtbds.situation: an item I want is out of stock online
jtbds.motivation: be notified by email when it becomes available again
jtbds.outcome: avoid checking back manually
sourceQuotes: It's frustrating when an item I want is out of stock online. As a regular shopper, I want an option to be notified by email when an out-of-stock item becomes available again, so that I don't have to keep checking back manually.

jtbds.statement: When sending a Costco order as a gift, I want the option to add a gift message and hide the price on the packing slip, so I can ensure the recipient has a better gifting experience.
jtbds.situation: sending a Costco order as a gift
jtbds.motivation: add a gift message and hide the price on the packing slip
jtbds.outcome: ensure the recipient has a better gifting experience
sourceQuotes: When sending a Costco order as a gift, I want the option to add a gift message and hide the price on the packing slip, so the recipient has a better gifting experience.

jtbds.statement: When viewing food products, I want to find relevant recipes, so I can get inspiration and see more value in the products.
jtbds.situation: viewing food products
jtbds.motivation: find relevant recipes
jtbds.outcome: get inspiration and see more value in the products
sourceQuotes: To increase engagement, when viewing food products (like Kirkland olive oil or spices), we should link to relevant recipes on the Costco Connection website, so users get inspiration and see more value in the products.

jtbds.statement: When I run out of a product at home that I originally bought at Costco, I want to scan its barcode using the mobile app, so I can quickly find it online and reorder it.
jtbds.situation: I run out of a product at home that I originally bought at Costco
jtbds.motivation: scan its barcode using the mobile app
jtbds.outcome: quickly find it online and reorder it
sourceQuotes: When I run out of a product at home that I originally bought at Costco, I want to scan its barcode using the mobile app, so I can quickly find it online and reorder it.

jtbds.statement: When browsing categories on the mobile app, I want the back button to take me to the previous category level, so I don't lose my place while exploring related products
jtbds.situation: browsing categories on the mobile app
jtbds.motivation: the back button to take me to the previous category level
jtbds.outcome: I don't lose my place while exploring related products
sourceQuotes: When browsing categories on the mobile app, I want the back button to take me to the previous *category level*, not all the way back to the homepage, so I don't lose my place while exploring related products.

jtbds.statement: When comparing several similar products, I want a built-in comparison tool on the site, so I can see key features side-by-side easily.
jtbds.situation: comparing several similar products
jtbds.motivation: a built-in comparison tool on the site
jtbds.outcome: see key features side-by-side easily
sourceQuotes: Participants often open multiple tabs to compare similar items (e.g., different models of coffee makers).

jtbds.statement: When I'm browsing and not ready to buy, I want an obvious way to save items I'm interested in, so I can easily find them again later without having to search.
jtbds.situation: I'm browsing and not ready to buy
jtbds.motivation: I want an obvious way to save items I'm interested in
jtbds.outcome: I can easily find them again later without having to search
sourceQuotes: When I'm browsing and not ready to buy, I want an obvious way to save items I'm interested in, so I can easily find them again later without having to search.

jtbds.statement: When I know the category but not the exact item, I want to filter search results by brand, price range, and customer ratings, so I can narrow down the options quickly without endless scrolling.
jtbds.situation: I know the category but not the exact item
jtbds.motivation: I want to filter search results by brand, price range, and customer ratings
jtbds.outcome: I can narrow down the options quickly without endless scrolling
sourceQuotes: As someone who knows what *category* I want but not the exact item, I want to filter search results by brand, price range, and maybe even customer ratings, so that I can narrow down the huge number of options quickly without endless scrolling.

scenarios.statement: As a user with visual impairment, I want to increase the font size on the website and app, so that I can read product descriptions and other text comfortably.
scenarios.action: increase the font size on the website and app
scenarios.value: read product descriptions and other text comfortably

scenarios.action: save multiple shipping addresses
scenarios.value: streamline order processing to various locations

scenarios.action: receive real-time delivery updates
scenarios.value: plan my schedule around the delivery

scenarios.action: quickly find and update my payment methods
scenarios.value: avoid interruptions during checkout

scenarios.value: save time and avoid unnecessary trips to the pharmacy

scenarios.value: make an informed decision about whether to purchase online or in-store

scenarios.value: efficiently manage my time and household needs

scenarios.value: make an informed purchase decision without leaving the site

scenarios.value: avoid carrying the physical card

scenarios.value: avoid repeatedly checking the website

scenarios.value: make the gift feel more special and thoughtful
